Text: I tested it, but the Project Fokker is WAAAAAAY better.... this bird does NOT simulate the flying of a real fokker... bad work on system simulation but good work on the good-looking panels... cause that's what they are... good looking... and only that... model sucks too... but a lot of repaints for it....

Also tested here and it works perfectly. I disagree with you, BaMordi. The flight model on this Fokker is really rather good. I, too, like the Project Fokker model, but unfortunately, there are those of us who really like to have a VC on their aircraft, and the OMWings version fits the bill perfectly. Not the greatest panel or VC, but it all works solidly, lots of liveries (if you can get them), and absolutely smooth on frames. Overall, a great aircraft. Thanks to the poster.

I have to concur, this model is splendid!! No learning curve whatsoever and some pretty neat features too......thanks much for the upload.
Can't wait to get some liveries though.

Thank you.
Was using the Project Fokker until I fly this one.
Both are good .
could someone please re-seed this bird and the liveries for fs9...?
68%... someone seed and i'll give that man a banana...
